typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrdersNew
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(10,0),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrderDetailsNew
OrdersNew, OrderDetailsNew join(OrdersNew@OrderID == OrderDetailsNew@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = OrdersNew@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = OrdersNew@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID = OrdersNew@OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		CreatedDate = OrderDetailsNew@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = OrderDetailsNew@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
